column4: can someone please tell me how to combine multiple wget commands into 1 line
can someone please tell me how to combine multiple wget commands into 1 line
can someone please tell me how to combine multiple wget commands into 1 line
you can list urls to download in a separate file and use: wget -i file.txt; to grab them all. if that isn't what you want, you should be a bit more specific about what you are tryihg to do
